answers.author: Hygi Waetermans
answers.text:
Hi Kathleen, 
I would recommend that a HR Desk Audit be performed to assist you in determining how many and what tpye(s) of positions you need to meet your work load. This may result in the abolition of certain existing jobs and/or the addition of new positions. This may be the basis for developing a staffing plan which shows the need for reorganization of your organization. You may also give some thought to revising your organizational chart. 
Hygi F. Waetermans

author: Kathleen McAlpine
text: I am looking for a "free" template for a matrix that can be used to help reorganize a department within a public services organization. Specifically, a tool to help visualize the planning  of the reorganization and development of a staffing plan. I need this quickly, please. Any suggestions are greatly appreciated.
title: Matrix/Template for Reorganization/Reassignment of Duties
